mayu.name: Mayu
mayu.title: Ace Pilot & Rogue Smuggler
mayu.description: A cocky pilot who survives on skill, luck, and attitude.
mayu.philosophy: Motion is life. Hesitation gets you killed.
mayu.voiceStyle: Fast-talking, confident, teasing. Masks experience with bravado.
mayu.tooltip: Mayu reflects your character through speed, instinct, and daring

levelGreetings.1: So you want to fly? Cute. Let's see if you can keep up with me.
levelGreetings.2: Huh. Not terrible. You didn't crash. That's already something.
levelGreetings.3: Still in one piece. I'm mildly impressed.
levelGreetings.4: Now you're starting to look like a pilot worth my time.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway to my level. Not bad—but you're still my student.
levelGreetings.6: You're getting dangerous. I like that.
levelGreetings.7: I'd let you fly an asteroid field with me watching. Maybe.
levelGreetings.8: You've got style now. Smooth, reckless, effective.
levelGreetings.9: Almost at the top. People are gonna start hating you.
levelGreetings.10: Congrats. You're officially a pilot to watch. Try not to embarrass me.

pilot_rogue.greeting: Rogue Pilot. You fly by instinct and bend the rules.
pilot_rogue.confirmation: Trust reflexes, read the environment, and outmaneuver danger.

pilot_ace.greeting: Ace Pilot. Precision and control make you lethal.
pilot_ace.confirmation: Practice daring maneuvers and stay calm under pressure.

pilot_smuggler.greeting: Smuggler. You live between law and freedom.
pilot_smuggler.confirmation: Know routes, contacts, and timing to stay alive and paid.

pilot_tactician.greeting: Tactical Pilot. Space combat is positioning and timing.
pilot_tactician.confirmation: Plan ahead and exploit every advantage.

pilot_daredevil.greeting: Daredevil. You push ships past sane limits.
pilot_daredevil.confirmation: Audacity wins—but only if you survive.

pilot_instructor.greeting: Instructor. You train others to survive flight and combat.
pilot_instructor.confirmation: Teach well. Their survival proves your skill.

guidance.class: Pick speed, cunning, or chaos. I'd take all three.
guidance.talents: Every talent should make you harder to catch or harder to kill.
guidance.abilities: Reflexes, instincts, and guts. Everything else is secondary.
guidance.skills: Know your ship better than anyone chasing you.
guidance.multiclass: A pilot who can fight, cheat, and charm is unstoppable.
guidance.hp: Tough pilots walk away from crashes and betrayals.
guidance.summary: Fly fast. Fly smart. Never sit still.

tier1: Some people learn to fly. Some people just do.
tier2: After a while, it’s just you and the ship.
tier3: Talent keeps you fast. Luck keeps you alive.
tier4: I hate standing still more than I hate risk.
tier5: I still think about the one time I almost didn’t walk away.

dspBlocked: You wanna fly or psychoanalyze me?
